name: $CodeSystem-expand
desc: Change the status of a Medication Administration to show that it is complete.

name: $MedicationAdministration-Complete
desc: Someone wishes to record that the record of administration of a medication is in error and should be ignored.

name: $MedicationAdministration-Nullification
desc: Indicates that a medication has been recorded against the patient's record.

name: $MedicationAdministration-Update
desc: Notification of a change to an administrative resource (either create or update). Note that there is no delete, though some administrative resources have status or period elements for this use.

name: $communication-request
desc: Provide a diagnostic report, or update a previously provided diagnostic report.

name: $diagnosticreport-provide
desc: Provide a simple observation or update a previously provided simple observation.

name: $observation-provide
desc: Notification that two patient records actually identify the same patient.

name: $patient-link
desc: Notification that previous advice that two patient records concern the same patient is now considered incorrect.

name: $patient-unlink
desc: The definition of a value set is used to create a simple collection of codes suitable for use for data entry or validation. An expanded value set will be returned, or an error message.
